meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>surplus</kanji> (that's an extra!) <kanji>earthquake</kanji> is a quake that  comes after the main (non-surplus) quake. That's an <vocabulary>aftershock</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
